turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I need to order a drink for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a drink from Peet's for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a Golden Caffè Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have a a medium golden cafe latte, with 2% milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at the Peet's on Campbell Avenue in Arlington, Virginia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's cafe store at campbell avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: byebye.
